description: Integrated mobile payment system with awards points to help promote business
Scenario: Stacy has some days off and visits her friends in Taichung. She would like to go to Fengjia Night Market for a great feast. Before her visit, she goes online to collect tourist information. However, she finds the info too fragmented and has a hard time deciding where to go.
pain_points_and_needs: •	 Info is often fragmented for tourist
•	 The effect of short-time promotion of a store cannot persist
•	 The store lacks marketing and technology capabilities
•	 The stores need to increase retention rate
smart_solution: The solution binds with Taichung Citizen Card to provide incentives (award points) for people to shop more. These reward points can be used for parking fee deduction with support to third-party mobile payments like EasyCard and iPass. This solution could also push promotion and discount information to consumers, and to provide recommendations to tourists visiting Taichung.
adopted_technology: Web & App, AI big data analytics, mobile payment
benefits: •	 This solution is involved in 2018 Taichung World Flora Exposition and festivals in 21 shopping districts
•	 This solution integrates the reward points from shopping districts into Taichung Citizen Cards
•	 Offers integrated info for tourists with incentives to help stores achieve a higher retention rate
solution_description: This solution integrates Taichung Citizen Card and multiple mobile payment methods to enhance the shopping experience, and to help the public accumulate rewards points to shop more
